attributes.action: make 11/11 a National Bank Holiday all over the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am originally from Flanders and resident in this beautiful country now.
I think that the Armistice or Poppy Day 11/11 should be a national bank holiday in this country as well such as in my effected country from next year onwards to remember properly and create a day of silence and self reflection.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
